page.title: 03NAIRN SHOPPING PATTERNS
page.content: In a small sample survey of shoppers on{Nairn High Street}a number of patterns seemed to emerge.The majority of the shoppers we spoke to still bought their food in local shops.The {High Street}food shops seemed to attract the same numbers of shoppers as the new{Templetons Supermarket} although a{large family grocer}has closed recently.Most people interviewed however said that they purchased clothing and household articles in{Inverness}or{Elgin.}We felt that the elderly without transport were most dependent on local shops. At local council meetings recently concern has been expressed that too many premises on the{High St.}are being occupied by banks,building societies and offices.We found{4}banks {4}building societies and{10}offices.
